comment: Dr. Jamison is literally so considerate. Even though I got a B on my final paper she really worked with me to raise my grade.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Dr. Jamison has a very engaging and welcoming teaching style. She says upfront she appreciates student involvement, opinions, experiences, etc. in an non intimidating, open discussion setting. She has a coaching style of teaching, letting you know what you do well and where you need some practice. I wish Dr. Jamison taught more than Engl 1102!!

I took her ENGL 1102 class in spring 2019. There were only 11 things we were graded on but she gave us 100's on 2 or 3 of them, I think she ran out of time to grade them. There was a 10 page minimum paper as the final, which wasn't too bad but she takes points for grammar & mispelling, ect. Definately learned a lot about research though!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Miss Jamison is an amazing professor who truly cares about your grades, she is always open to answer any questions you have through out the day. She has definitely helped me become a more complex writer and the textbook you actually buy for the class is really helpful.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: I wasn't the biggest fan of Dr. Jamison the first few weeks, but she grew on me after a while. She is a very nice lady and a great teacher! She gives you lots of feedback.
She is one of the best professors I've ever had. It's easy to talk to her so just make sure that you're going to class and paying attention because she does tend to change the due dates.

Go to class or else you will miss out on a lot of due dates. Her instructions are a little confusing so make sure you pay attention. Shes really sweet and makes sure you can come in contact with her outside of class.

This was a hybrid class so one day you go to class and the other day you check in online for assignments.  She gave weekly online assignments but they were not hard.  When you're in the actual class she's readily available to help and provide discussions.  The posts/discussions are pretty cool. You'll enjoy it. Be ready to talk and discuss.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
